minor.round_the_next_corner.description: You can find a place to shelter, smoke a roll-up and let things blow over. Gain the Delve skill. Once per delve, you find an out-of-the-way location where you can catch your breath and recuperate without fear of being discovered by your enemies. You can take your time and heal here without incurring a bane.
minor.sergeant.name: Sergeant
minor.sergeant.description: You wear the trademark heavy long-coat of a Sergeant of the Hounds, designed to mark you out as a protector of the people. +1 Blood Protection. Once per situation, when an adversary or NPC directs their attention towards an ally, declare that they pay attention to you instead.
minor.judge.name: Sędzia
minor.judge.description: When you track a condemned target as part of a delve, increase your stress dice size by 1 step.
minor.jury.name: Jury
minor.jury.description: You no longer need evidence to condemn a target, but you do need a name, a picture or a first-hand description.
minor.executioner.name: Executioner
minor.executioner.description: When you attack a condemned target, increase your stress dice size by 1 step.
minor.double_duty.name: Double Duty
minor.double_duty.description: Choose two benefits when using this ability; those who take part gain the benefits of both. You can't choose the same benefit twice.
minor.encampment.name: Encampment
minor.encampment.description: You may now perform this action on a delve; add a D6 bane to the delve's resistance if you do.
minor.emergency_supplies.name: Emergency Supplies
minor.emergency_supplies.description: If you have a few minutes to spare, you can give yourself or one ally one of the benefits from the list by consuming a resource worth D6 or higher. This does not count as the per-session use of the ability.
minor.legendary.name: Legenda
minor.legendary.description: Twoje spojrzenie działa teraz na rzeczy, które nie powinny się ciebie bać.
minor.nose_to_nose.name: Twarzą w Twarz
minor.no_sympathy.name: Bez Współczucia
minor.no_sympathy.description: Raz na sytuację możesz rzucić swoim sojusznikom pełne dezaprobaty spojrzenie, które motywuje ich do działania. Twoje spojrzenie działa wtedy jak (Leczenie/naprawa Umysł/Krew D6, Zasięgowy).
minor.over_the_top.name: Over The Top
minor.keep_smiling.name: Keep Smiling
minor.keep_smiling.description: The first time you suffer Mind stress in a situation, do not roll for fallout.
minor.homecoming.name: Homecoming
minor.homecoming.description: When you enter a location with the Haven domain after a delve, refresh stress according to the size and importance of the location. Three shacks with a campfire is D4; Derelictus is D12.
minor.limping_onward.name: Limping Onward
minor.limping_onward.description: UNSTOPPABLE also increases your Delve stress dice by one step.
minor.scars_like_medals.name: Scars Like Medals
minor.scars_like_medals.description: Gain +1 Blood protection for each ongoing fallout you have.
minor.on_your_feet.name: On Your Feet
minor.on_your_feet.description: Once per session, downgrade a Major Blood fallout you have to a Minor Blood fallout.

major.condemn.name: Potępienie
major.condemn.description: You have the authority to declare someone as a wanted criminal. Once per session, when you find evidence of someone's (or something's) crimes, you can publicly condemn them. When you or another Hound tracks down a condemned target, roll with mastery.
major.forewarned_and_forearmed.name: Forewarned And Forearmed
major.forewarned_and_forearmed.description: Never get into a fight you can't win. Once per session, when you have an hour or two to spare in a landmark, you can make preparations for the coming challenges. Pick one of the benefits from the list below. You and all other characters who choose to take part in preparations gain this benefit until they next enter a landmark. • Whetstone and Weapon Drill. One piece of Kill equipment gains the Brutal tag. • Checked and Triple-Checked. One piece of Delve equipment gains the Trusty tag. • Toughen Up. Gain +1 Blood protection. • One for the Road. Gain +1 Mind protection. • Creative Acquisitions. Gain +1 Supplies protection.
major.stare_down.name: Gromiący Wzrok
major.stare_down.description: Masz reputację przerażającego egzekutora. Wystarczy, że spojrzysz na niektórych ludzi, by rzucili broń. Twoje spojrzenie działa jak broń (Broń D6, Zasięgowy). Działa to tylko wtedy, gdy twój cel cię widzi i jeśli jest w stanie się ciebie przestraszyć (np. przestępcy, ale nie sercokwiste bestie). „Broni” tej możesz użyć w schronieniu lub innym miejscu bez wywoływania wielkiego zamieszania. Twoje spojrzenie nie zabija ludzi — jest zniechęcające, a jeśli zmniejszysz nim odporność przeciwnika do 0, podda się, spróbuje negocjować lub potknie się podczas ucieczki.
major.trench_fighter.name: Trench-Fighter
major.trench_fighter.description: Your mind is scarred with mud, gore and screams from a century before your birth. When you attack at close range, your attacks gain the Piercing tag, even if you're unarmed.
major.unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
major.unstoppable.description: You are filled with the spirits of those Hounds who have come before you. When you are suffering from ongoing Blood fallout, increase your Kill stress dice size by one step.

zenith.everlasting_stand.name: Everlasting Stand
zenith.everlasting_stand.description: As you feel your identity slipping away into the gestalt consciousness of the 33rd, you give everything you have to protect the people of the City Beneath. When a landmark you are in is under threat from outside powers (which is pretty much always true), activate this ability. You become the original owner of your badge - it might be an instantaneous process, it might take several weeks - as you prepare to defend the landmark. Once your preparations are complete, you are subsumed into the Hounds completely. The 33rd will watch the landmark you designated as safe indefinitely - nothing short of another zenith ability will put it in danger.
zenith.fulcrum.name: Fulcrum
zenith.fulcrum.description: Your actions have earned you the ultimate reward - your name replaces the one marked on your badge, and you are officially inducted into the 33rd. You are filled with the hopes and fears of every terrified, desperate person in the Heart. Until the end of the current situation, you roll five dice and pick the highest whenever you make an action. Once the situation ends, you slope off into the depths of the Heart to fight metaphysical battles beyond the understanding of mortals.
zenith.incursion.name: Wtargnięcie
zenith.incursion.description: You learn a fragment of the terrible truth behind what happened to the 33rd all those years ago, and understand why they can never die. At the culmination of a dark ritual, you smash your badge apart on an altar made from bones and shell casings, and summon the last moments of the 33rd to your location. Reality comes undone; the world is transformed into a twisted, burning maze of trench and razorwire, and the 33rd act out their terrified final moments on whoever they can find. The landmark you're in is destroyed, pretty much everything inside it dies and your mind is blasted into pieces as you witness the lengths they went to in order to survive.

incarnadine.description:
Łatwo jest popaść w długi, ale nie w aż taki katastrofalny poziom zadłużenia, który udało ci się osiągnąć. Musiałeś być bardzo dobry w pożyczaniu pieniędzy... i czasu, i wiary innych, i wszystkiego, co dostałeś w swoje ręce, by przyciągnąć uwagę Incarne, Karmazynowego Boga Długów.

Pewnego dnia obudziłeś się i odkryłeś, że zaginęła jakaś część twojego życia, jakby zostało przeszukane przez niebiańskich komorników. Nieruchomości, ruchomości, wspomnienia, członkowie rodziny, emocje i pragnienia zostały podzielone między twoich wierzycieli przez niewidzialną siłę. Być może twój partner już cię nie poznawał, może nigdy nie byliście małżeństwem. Może wróciłeś do domu, by zastać brudne opuszczone pokoje, jakby nikt w nich nie mieszkał od dziesięcioleci.

Incarne naznaczył cię, piętno na twoim sercu położyło kres życiu, jakie znałeś. Niektórzy ludzie tego szukają, moc i wolność zawsze wiążą się ze se spisaniem starego życia na straty, a Incarne nagradza ich niesamowitymi zdolnościami, które doprowadzają ich (i innych) w jeszcze głębsze długi. Wkroczyłeś do Serca, aby znaleźć cel, szczęście lub zapomnienie.

Rzadko mówisz o piętnie lub o tym, jak nisko upadłeś, by handlować historiami, godzinami i życiem w ciemnościach Miasta Poniżej. Ale znak swędzi. Twoja chciwość swędzi. Nosisz ciężar większy, niż ci się wydaje, i wypychasz gniew, smutek i to, co utraciłeś w ciemność, daleko poza światła schronienia.
incarnadine.name: Inkarnadyn

core.the_cost_of_doing_business.name: Cena Interesów
core.the_cost_of_doing_business.description: A mix of scrying and luck magic lets you portion off your fortune to be used as you wish. At any time you may consume a resource and roll its dice; set this dice aside. When you perform an action or inflict stress, but before you roll the dice to resolve it, you may replace any unrolled dice in your pool with the dice you set aside. Once used in this manner, it is consumed. If you have an unspent dice set aside at the end of the session, you take Fortune stress equal to the value rolled on the dice.
core.mutually_assured_destruction.name: Wzajemne Gwarantowane Zniszczenie
core.mutually_assured_destruction.description: Jeśli pójdziesz na dno, zabierzesz wroga ze sobą. Jeśli zginiesz, umieszczone na twojej duszy zaklęcia ochronne spróbują zabić tego, kto ciebie zabił. Wybuchasz i zadajesz stres równy D8 + twój aktualny stres Szczęścia każdemu, kto stoi w pobliżu.

minor.a_red_and_bloody_business.name: A Red And Bloody Business
minor.a_red_and_bloody_business.description: You are well versed in the oldest transaction in the world - blood for blood. Gain the Kill skill. If you're killing someone or something that's shed your blood before, your attack gains the Brutal tag.
minor.an_eye_for_the_strange.name: An Eye For The Strange
minor.an_eye_for_the_strange.description: Years of exposure to unnatural energies from the items you've bought and sold has left a dirty handprint on your soul. Gain the Occult domain. Once per session, you may exchange one domain on one resource for any other.
minor.better_safe_than_sorry.name: Better Safe Than Sorry
minor.better_safe_than_sorry.description: Gain +1 Protection in the Mind, Echo, Supplies or Fortune resistance. You can take this advance more than once.
minor.creative_acquisitions.name: Creative Acquisitions
minor.creative_acquisitions.description: You know that the best price for any item is free. Gain the Sneak skill. When you attempt to steal a resource or equipment of D10 value or higher, roll wit hmastery.  Core Traits
minor.creative_book_keeping.name: Creative Book-Keeping
minor.creative_book_keeping.description: A flexible grasp on reality means you have something for every occasion on hand. Gain +2 Supplies Protection.
minor.eyes_in_the_back_of_your_head.name: Eyes In The Back Of Your Head
minor.eyes_in_the_back_of_your_head.descriptio: You've set up enough crooked deals to know when you're about to be suckered into one. Gain the Discern skill. When you stand still and concentrate, you can quite literally see behind you as though you had eyes in the back of your head. Doing this for too long causes headaches and nausea.
minor.jack_of_all_trades.name: Wszechstronnie Uzdolniony
minor.jack_of_all_trades.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących umiejętności: Manipulacja, Obserwacja, Odporność, Polowanie, Zabijanie, Łączenie, Skradanie. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.lost_it_all.name: Lost It All
minor.lost_it_all.description: You understand - truly - the wretched sensation of having less than nothing. Gain the Desolate domain. Once per session ask the GM where the nearest source of wealth is and they will tell you.
minor.make_do.name: Make Do
minor.make_do.description: Periods of poverty have taught you to make the best of what you've got and keep things ticking over until your next big score. Gain the Mend skill. Once per session, you can immediately fix something that's broken - but it only works once. After that, it's destroyed past the point of repair.
minor.on_the_run.name: On The Run
minor.on_the_run.description: You've been running from your creditors for years; you're not above crawling through shit on your hands and knees to survive. Gain the Evade skill. Mark D4 stress to Supplies to shift the attention of a person or creature to another PC or an important NPC.
minor.priest_of_incarne.name: Priest Of Incarne
minor.priest_of_incarne.description: Most Incarnadines pay lip service to their god whilst paying off their debt; you've bought in wholesale, and you understand the terrible power of your patron. Gain the Religion domain. Once per session, when you visit a shrine of Incarne and preach to the faithful, refresh equal to the size of the shrine (D4 for cupboard-sized devotionals, D12 for a glorious temple). The Red Market is too fractious and shifting to act as a shrine for the purposes of this ability.
minor.red_marketeer.name: Red Marketeer
minor.red_marketeer.description: For a while, you were bold enough to trade blood and souls in the shifting alleyways of the Red Market. Gain the Warren domain. If someone tries to take what's yours, your attacks gain the Brutal tag when you attempt to stop them.
minor.valuable_asset.name: Valuable Asset
minor.valuable_asset.description: Incarne won't let you die, because then they can't collect what they're owed. Gain +2 Fortune Protection.
minor.areas_of_opportunity.name: Areas of Opportunity
minor.areas_of_opportunity.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących domen: Klątwa, Odludzie, Okultyzm, Religia, Technologia, Norowisko. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.deadeye.name: Sokole Oko
minor.deadeye.description: The benefit also applies to ranged weapons.
minor.never_saw_it_coming.name: Never Saw It Coming
minor.never_saw_it_coming.description: Mark D4 stress to Mind to activate this power for your next use of BACKSTAB. Your attack dice increases in size by two steps. NEVER SAW IT COMING only functions against a living person.
minor.remuneration.name: Remuneration
minor.remuneration.description: When you reduce a target to 0 resistance using BACKSTAB, remove stress from Supplies equal to double the value of your current tier.
minor.invest.name: Invest
minor.invest.description: BROKER can now be used on yourself.
minor.transferral.name: Transferral
minor.transferral.description: Roll Mend+Haven to cast this spell; on a success, move a Minor fallout from any willing target other than yourself to any other willing target. Both targets must be within arm's reach of one another, and the receiving party must be able to bear the fallout (i.e. a creature with no legs can't receive the LIMPING fallout).
minor.inflict.name: Inflict
minor.inflict.description: When you cast TRANSFERRAL, the target receiving the fallout does not have to be willing to receive it. Casting the spell in this way uses the target's difficulty instead of standard difficulty.
minor.addict.name: Addict
minor.addict.description: When you cast CRAVE, the target will desire the subject of your choosing until the end of the session. If they don't get what they want by the end of the session, they either descend into violence to acquire it or lose their mind in despair (GM's choice).
minor.viral.name: Viral
minor.viral.description: When you cast CRAVE, the target has the capacity to pass the desire on to anyone they speak to (aside from you) until it fades - there's a 1 in 6 chance of infection (roll a D6) for every person they talk to for more than a minute. You are immune to the effects of this spell; your allies aren't.
minor.conditioning.name: Conditioning
minor.conditioning.description: When you cast CRAVE, mark D6 stress to Mind to scar the target with the desire. From now on, the first time they see you each session, treat them as though you had just cast CRAVE on them with the same subject of desire.
minor.buy_off.name: Buy Off
minor.buy_off.description: Once per situation, if you are wearing your Debtor's Reds and incur stress, you can mark stress to Supplies instead of another resistance.
minor.cycle_of_debt.name: Cycle Of Debt
minor.cycle_of_debt.description: Roll Kill+Religion to cast this spell. Target an adversary who has been harmed by DEBTOR'S REDS. They mark stress equal to your current Supplies stress.
minor.assume_debt.name: Assume Debt
minor.assume_debt.description: Whilst wearing your Debtor's Reds, any time you mark Supplies stress you may choose to ignore your Supplies protection. If you do so, you may immediately cause someone within arms reach to mark the same amount of stress that you have just taken.
minor.connection.name: Połączenie
minor.connection.description: When you cast KARMIC LEDGER, you can see who the debt is owed to via an ephemeral red string connecting the two parties. It's easy enough to follow it.
minor.harvest.name: Żniwa
minor.harvest.description: When you cast KARMIC LEDGER, you can beseech Incarne (ask the GM) to rate the value of their debt on a scale from D4 (low) to D12 (extremely high). When you murder the target and give their debt to Incarne, remove stress equal to the dice size of their debt.
minor.candidate.name: Candidate
minor.candidate.description: Once per session, when you spend a few minutes communing with Incarne, they show you a vision of a person with outstanding karmic debt in your nearby area.
minor.proliferation.name: Proliferation
minor.proliferation.description: Whilst at a haven that's in your trade network, you and your party may use haunts located in havens that you are not currently visiting. When you use a haunt in this way, halve the value rolled on the dice when determining how much stress to remove from your resistances. If you use such a haunt to remove fallout, increase the cost by 1 step.
minor.pathways.name: Pathways
minor.pathways.description: When you and your allies attempt to establish a Connection between landmarks and at least one of them is part of your trade network, roll with mastery.
minor.money_talks.name: Money Talks
minor.money_talks.description: Whilst at a shrine to Incarne, you can communicate with bonds or haunts in any haven that's part of your trade network.

major.backstab.name: Backstab
major.backstab.description: They were fools to have trusted you. When you attack a target who is unaware of your position with a one-handed melee weapon, your attacks gain the Piercing tag.
major.broker.name: Pośrednik
major.broker.description: You beseech Incarne for aid. Roll Mend+Haven to cast this spell. On a success, remove D6 stress from any resistance (other than Supplies) for one nearby character other than yourself.
major.crave.name: Crave
major.crave.description: Debt is just quantified want; you cut out the middleman. Roll Compel+Haven to cast this spell on an NPC you're speaking to; on a success, you can instill a great desire for something in them. If the thing they want is unusual for them, casting this spell is Risky. On a success, they now fiercely want whatever it is you've specified until the end of the current situation.
major.debtors_reds.name: Debtor's Reds
major.debtors_reds.description: Incarne's presence thrums through you; you are resplendent, terrible, and hard to look at directly. When you wear the sacred robes of Incarne and a myriad of holy symbols, ledgers and freshly-minted coins, you may automatically cause 1 stress to an adversary who can see you each time you act.
major.karmic_ledger.name: Karmic Ledger
major.karmic_ledger.description: Once you know what's keeping someone awake at night, it's much easier to take advantage of them. Roll Discern+Haven to cast this spell on a target you can see and hear. On a success, you determine their deepest karmic debt: the greatest thing that they've taken from someone else (money, valuables, freedom, a son, etc). When you act on this information, roll with mastery.
major.network.name: Network
major.network.description: You draw the faithful - those whose lives have been scarred by debt - around a symbol of Incarne, and harvest the bounty they offer up to your god. When in a landmark with the Haven domain, roll Mend+Religion to cast this spell as you build a shrine to Incarne; on a success, you add the landmark to your trade network. When you enter a haven that you have added to your trade network, gain a D4(Haven) resource. Increase the dice size of this resource by one step for every additional haven in the network after the first to a maximum of D10. If you take this ability, you or any other incarnadine may now incur the fallout below.

zenith.ultimate_credit.name: Ultimate Credit
zenith.ultimate_credit.description: A life lived in service of Incarne brings with it a powerful favour. Once, and only once, you can buy anything (except the Heart Itself). You own this physical, conceptual or immaterial thing and have as much control over it as you do a knife, a suit of clothes or anything else you own. Two sessions from now, the debt will be recalled, and it will take your life.
zenith.ultimate_debt.name: Ultimate Debt
zenith.ultimate_debt.description: You wield the wrath of Incarne. Once, and only once, you can unload the weight of Incarne's debt upon a single luckless individual, location or entity (except the Heart Itself). Anything and everything that could go wrong for the target does go wrong, and it does so catastrophically, but they do not die. Once per situation, you can harvest the debt on the target to clear stress from your resistance tracks - when you do so, roll a D10. On a 2 or higher, remove that much stress. On a 1, your luck runs out, and a cosmic loophole sees Incarne claim your life.
zenith.ultimate_reward.name: Ultimate Reward
zenith.ultimate_reward.description: You did it - you paid it off. You finally got out of Incarne's debt. You can retire to a normal life wherever you please and start a family, maybe set up a small business - whatever you want. You die several years from now, maybe decades, surrounded by your loved ones.

junk_mage.description:
Byłeś czarodziejem, ale zawsze wiedziałeś, że możesz być potężniejszy. Magia w Mieście Powyżej jest zaledwie bladą imitacją tego, czym może być w Sercu. Tu na dole leży prawdziwa moc, którą można zabrać (np. kradnąc) od istot o ogromnej mocy. Rytuały okultystów i cuda kapłanów Iglicy to dwie strony tego samego medalu. To tylko sztuczki, które wykorzystują energię otoczenia, by osiągnąć pożądane efekty.

Posmakowałeś snów starożytnych. Wiesz, że w Mieście Poniżej drzemią potężne istoty i znasz sekrety, które pozwalają twojemu umysłowi zgłębić ich ogromną, obcą świadomość. Twoje zaklęcia składają się z urywków snów, fragmentów prawdziwych imion i majaczeń szaleńców.

Twoja moc jest niezaprzeczalna, uzależniająca. Splatanie — kradzież mocy od boskich istot jest odurzające. Rozkoszujesz się dotykiem szaleństwa, przeklętego wglądu w rozległą i straszną prawdę, ukrytą poza rzeczywistością. Poczytalność, bezpieczeństwo, reputacja, wszystko to ma drugorzędne znaczenie. Liczy się tylko pogoń za wiedzą tajemną.
junk_mage.name: Narkomag

core.ravening_knowledge.name: Głód Wiedzy
core.ravening_knowledge.description: Pragniesz tego, co inni nazywają „szaleństwem”. Przebłyski prawdy, które pustoszą twój słaby, śmiertelny umysł, dają ci niewyobrażalną moc. Gdy poziom stresu Umysłu wynosi 4 lub więcej, możesz rzucać z mistrzostwem podczas rzucania zaklęć.
core.sacrifice.name: Ofiara
core.sacrifice.description: Jesteś gotów poświęcić wszystko dla kolejnego trafienia. Przed rzuceniem zaklęcia możesz zdecydować się na zniszczenie zasobu z domeny „Okultyzm”. Rzuć kośćmi zasobu, wyrzucona wartość zostanie dodana do twojej ochrony przed stresem poniesionym w wyniku rzucenia zaklęcia.

minor.back_pocket_arcana.name: Pełne Kieszenie
minor.back_pocket_arcana.description: Twoja torba jest przepełniona resztkami po okultystycznych składnikach: wiórki iglicadzkiego bursztynu, przeklęty atrament, gwoździe z niesłusznych ukrzyżowań. Otrzymujesz +2 ochrony Zapasów.
minor.been_everywhere.name: Wszędobylski
minor.been_everywhere.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących domen: Klątwa, Odludzie, Schronienie, Okultyzm, Religia, Technologia, Norowisko. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.by_any_means.name: Za Wszelką Cenę
minor.by_any_means.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących umiejętności: Manipulacja, Wyprawa, Obserwacja, Unik, Polowanie, Zabijanie, Łączenie, Skradanie. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.frontier_etiquette.name: Frontier Etiquette
minor.frontier_etiquette.description: Your time in the City Above wasn't for naught; you learned how to hold a conversation, smile and nod in all the right places and read a room to avoid offence. Gain the Haven domain. The first time each session that you use a haunt, your spent resource counts as one dice size higher.
minor.litanies_of_false_power.name: Litanie Fałszywych Potęg
minor.litanies_of_false_power.description: Doskonale wiesz, że bogowie tego świata są odlegli, martwi lub niezainteresowani, ale jeśli jesteś uważny, mogą ujawnić przydatne sekrety. Zdobywasz domenę „Religia”. Kiedy korzystasz ze zdolności OFIARA, możesz również zużywać zasoby z domeny „Religia”.
minor.mark_of_hunger.name: Mark Of Hunger
minor.mark_of_hunger.description: You can taste the power slumbering in the City Beneath, and you want it more than anything. Gain the Delve skill. You can smell sources of magical power - the more potent and active, the more pungent the smell. Different types of magic have different scents: relics of the Moon Beneath have the aroma of wine and butter, necromancy smells like nujabian kafee and the occult technology of the Vermissian resembles malt and rich tannins.
minor.mark_of_the_phantom.name: Mark Of The Phantom
minor.mark_of_the_phantom.description: Silver-grey skinspells and litanies of obfuscation wind their way over your body; you are an aberration in space and time, glitching through the City Beneath. Gain the Evade skill. Once per situation, when you mark stress due to physical harm or detection, you may make the GM reroll the stress dice. Keep the second result, even if it's higher.
minor.mark_of_shadow.name: Mark Of Shadow
minor.mark_of_shadow.description: You conceal your activities from rivals and superstitious fools with a mark etched on your skin; when you speak the right words, you become hard to notice. Gain the Sneak skill. Hiding from someone or something is always a Standard action for you, and never Risky or Dangerous.
minor.mark_of_the_weaver.name: Mark Of The Weaver
minor.mark_of_the_weaver.description: Your hands are covered in spiderweb ink; you have the capacity to stitch, fix and bind with a thought. Gain the Mend skill. Once per session, you can fix someone or something in a matter of seconds, even if it would usually take hours of careful work.
minor.rust_and_iron.name: Rust And Iron
minor.rust_and_iron.description: You know of pathways that are clockwork and galvanic, shifting and malevolent, and were built by no mortal hand. Gain the Technology domain. Learn the following spell: roll Mend+Technology to improve a piece of equipment that has moving parts using a ritual that takes around half an hour. On a success, increase the equipment's quality by 1 step (standard becomes good, good becomes excellent) and give it the Dangerous and Unreliable tags. Once you have improved a piece of equipment with this spell, you can't improve it again.
minor.siphon_of_fortune.name: Szczęśliwiec
minor.siphon_of_fortune.description: Istnieją miejsca, w których możesz obstawić coś więcej niż tylko gotówkę przy grze w karty. Twoją stawką jest szczęście. +2 Ochrony Szczęścia.
minor.warding_spells.name: Zaklęcia Ochronne
minor.warding_spells.description: Zdobywasz +1 Ochrony we Krwi, Echo, Szczęściu lub Zapasach. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.wretched_and_glorious.name: Wretched And Glorious
minor.wretched_and_glorious.description: Your body is a prison, and when it blurs or breaks, you feel closer to your patrons. Gain the Cursed domain. When you use the SACRIFICE ability above, you may also consume resources with the Cursed domain.
minor.ecstasy.name: Ekstaza
minor.ecstasy.description: When you cast CURSE OF THE SKY COURT, you can focus it on a single target rather than everyone nearby. This individual is overwhelmed with joy, and energised to seek more of it - they find it hard to focus on even immediate dangers. As long as you maintain your concentration on them, their difficulty is reduced to Standard.
minor.a_moment_eternal.name: A Moment Eternal
minor.a_moment_eternal.description: Roll Evade+Occult to cast this spell. On a success, your immediate area is time-shifted. For each hour outside of the area, those in the area experience 4 hours of time passing. While intended to stretch out a perfect moment, this can make time-sensitive tasks easier to attempt. The barrier that surrounds the area is blurry and indistinct, and if anyone from outside the area intrudes, the spell is broken and time resumes to normal speed.
minor.steal_the_night_away.name: Steal The Night Away
minor.steal_the_night_away.description: Once per session, when you engage in reckless hedonism, refresh D6. If you spend time with someone who fascinates you during the process, refresh D8 instead. These refreshes can be spent to remove fallout as though you were making use of a haunt.
minor.words_of_flame.name: Words Of Flame
minor.words_of_flame.description: Your unarmed attacks inflict D6 stress rather than D4.
minor.superheat.name: Superheat
minor.superheat.description: In melee, your unarmed attacks have the Piercing tag.
minor.coin_gold_blood.name: Coin-gold Blood
minor.coin_gold_blood.description: You gain Protection 5 against stress marked due to flame or heat.
minor.temporary_perfection.name: Temporary Perfection
minor.temporary_perfection.description: When you cast FRENZY OF THE SKY COURT, you gain access to a skill that you do not possess until the end of the situation.
minor.brisk_conjuration.name: Brisk Conjuration
minor.brisk_conjuration.description: You are able to summon an indiscriminate blast of air in a direction of your choice. This spell functions as a (Kill D4, Spread, Debilitating, One-Shot) weapon.
minor.maddening_storm.name: Maddening Storm
minor.maddening_storm.description: Roll Compel+Occult to cast this spell. On a success, an area roughly the size of a city block - centred on you - is assailed with stiff winds that stir up debris and howl deafeningly through tunnels and vents, but everything within ten feet of you remains calm. All Sneak and Evade checks in this area are made with mastery, but the inhabitants definitely know something's going on. This effect lasts until the end of the current situation; if you move outside of the zone of calm at the centre beforehand, the spell ends.
minor.only_the_finest.name: Only The Finest
minor.only_the_finest.description: Once per situation, an item you are holding becomes Excellent quality. At the end of the situation, the item is destroyed.
minor.gorge.name: Gorge
minor.gorge.description: Once per situation, when you eat (destroy) a resource with the Haven domain, remove stress from Blood, Mind or Echo equal to half the amount rolled on the resource's dice.
minor.a_king_demands.name: A King Demands
minor.a_king_demands.description: Once per session, you can demand that a target holding any item gives you that item, and they must obey.
minor.slumbering_eternal.name: Wieczny Śniący
minor.slumbering_eternal.description: Nie musisz już oddychać powietrzem, niezależnie od sytuacji, nie udusisz się. Raz na sesję możesz także zlokalizować użyteczne źródło wody: strumień, rurę, odpływ, zbiornik, wodospad itp.
minor.body_of_water.name: Wodne Ciało
minor.body_of_water.description:
Nie możesz już usuwać konsekwencji ani stresu Krwi za pomocą miejsc odpoczynku. Jednak raz na sesję, gdy spędzisz co najmniej godzinę zanurzony w wodzie, możesz wybrać jedną z poniższych opcji:
  • Usuń cały stres Krwi.
  • Usuń wszystkie Pomniejsze Konsekwencje Krwi
  • Zmniejsz jedną Poważną Konsekwencję Krwi do Pomniejszej.
minor.grace.name: Wdzięk
minor.grace.description: Możesz chodzić po wodzie, jakby była to ziemia.
minor.benevolent.name: Benevolent
minor.benevolent.description: Instead of removing D6 stress from Echo, you or any allies may remove D6 stress from Supplies or Fortune instead.
minor.omnipresent.name: Wszechobecny
minor.omnipresent.description: When you cast this spell, you access the same temple every time, no matter where you are; it becomes a Fracture. At the GM's discretion, Major Mind fallout could result in you losing access to this specific temple, and Minor Mind fallout could see it robbed or otherwise compromised.
minor.bountiful.name: Obfitość
minor.bountiful.description: Once per session, when you access the temple, you can locate a non- unique item of D8 value or lower.

major.curse_of_the_sky_court.name: Curse Of The Sky Court
major.curse_of_the_sky_court.description: These fae spirits of air, long-banished from their birth realm, are in a zealous and perpetual quest for pleasure. Roll Compel+Occult to cast this spell by drinking strong liquor or taking narcotics and intoning an ancient contract. On a success, all those nearby are compelled to seek immediate pleasure: drink, drugs, dance, wild creation of art, music, general hedonism and miscellaneous frivolity. The alien creatures of the Heart may have an unusual definition of "pleasure" that defies mortal minds.
major.fire_of_the_red_king.name: Fire Of The Red King
major.fire_of_the_red_king.description: You have tasted the dreams of the Red king: his breath as fire, his blood as molten gold. This spell causes your unarmed attacks to gain the Ranged tag as you conjure flames on the clothing and bodies of those nearby. Each successive unarmed attack you inflict on the same target increases the size of your stress dice against that target by one step until the end of the situation.
major.frenzy_of_the_sky_court.name: Frenzy Of The Sky Court
major.frenzy_of_the_sky_court.description: The Court had their memories stripped away and their brains filled with nothing but air; though all of genius-level intelligence, they exist purely in a single, frantic moment. Roll Evade+Occult to cast this spell. On a success, you are filled with the mercurial energy of the Sky Court, and you gain +1 Protection to all resistances for the remainder of the situation. However, until the spell ends (and you can't end it early), any actions that require more than a couple of seconds' attention become Risky.
major.greed_of_the_red_king.name: Greed Of The Red King
major.greed_of_the_red_king.description: The Red King's one desire is wealth; he was so devoted to the pursuit of gold that he dreamed himself a reality of infinite splendour. Roll Discern+Occult to cast the spell. On a success, you determine what a target you can see wants most of all right now. In addition, you can smell money, or anything of particular value.
major.kiss_of_the_drowned_queen.name: Pocałunek Królowej Topielców
major.kiss_of_the_drowned_queen.description: Ujrzałeś zatopiony Dwór Królowej Topielców, gdzie śpi i oczekuje na odrodzenie swojego rodu. Jednym dotknięciem możesz wyczarować słoną wodę w płucach tych, którzy Ci się sprzeciwiają. To zaklęcie działa jako broń: (Broń D6, Przebijająca). Jeśli cel znajduje się co najmniej po pas w wodzie, zadajesz D8 obrażeń.
major.sanctum_of_the_stone_chorus.name: Sanctum Of The Stone Chorus
major.sanctum_of_the_stone_chorus.description: They claim, in a hundred voices like the scraping of tectonic plates, that they are the Old Gods, imprisoned in the Heart by upstart deities. Roll Discern+Religion to cast this spell. On a success, you find (or spontaneously create) a path to one of the parasitic temples of the Old Gods, which sucks existence from the world like ticks. When you meditate here, remove D6 stress from Echo; your allies may use the temple in the same way. You may not open more than one path to a temple at any one time. After an hour or so, the path will seal shut - but not without warning, so you'll have time to leave.

zenith.the_herald_of_the_red_king.name: The Herald Of The Red King
zenith.the_herald_of_the_red_king.description: You conjure forth a door to the King of Want, and his approach is terrible. You can only cast this spell once, but you do so automatically without needing to roll. The Red King appears, a writhing town-sized knot of jealousy and fire and iron- hard scales, and breathes flame so hot that it can destroy anyone and anything it touches. You can direct his attack. When you cast the spell, roll Endure+Occult. On a success, you become the new Red King, a furious engine of desire, and can be summoned by other Junk Mages. On a failure, you are added to his hoard. Either way, there's no coming back.
zenith.the_herald_of_the_drowned_queen.name: The Herald Of The Drowned Queen
zenith.the_herald_of_the_drowned_queen.descript: You give the Queen what she wants most of all: subjects. You can only cast this spell once, but you do so automatically without needing to roll. The landmark you're in is half-submerged in water, and from the depths in the centre a throne room rises, bearing the immortal majesty of the Drowned Queen. This is now her dominion, and you are her most trusted advisor; the remade landmark is utterly under your and the Queen's control. You have a session or two to get what you need out of the situation before you are retired as a player character - driven mad from occult stress, assassinated by agents of a rival haven, or betrothed to the Queen to cement the new expansion.
zenith.the_herald_of_the_stone_chorus.name: The Herald Of The Stone Chorus
zenith.the_herald_of_the_stone_chorus.descripti: You throw open the door to the Chorus' prison; while they look on in shock, you throw another captive into the cell. You can only cast this spell once, but you do so automatically without needing to roll. A creature or entity you are touching is sealed away in the Stone Chorus'prison eternally; you become part of the mechanism that locks the door, and cease to exist in any meaningful sense. Nothing can free the target from its prison short of you, the door, agreeing to open.

vermissian_knight.description:
The Vermissian is a cursed, centuries-old mass transport network that the people from the City Above built to get from place to place quicker. To power it, they tapped into the wellspring of potential that is the Heart, and damned every single tunnel and station to eternal weirdness. The Vermissian never officially opened. Now, desperate people, fringe historians and heretic cults hide in the infrastructure, using the strange unreality within to further their own ends.

Using barely-understood technology and living in the space between worlds, the Vermissian Knights do their level best to understand the parasite reality and protect others they find there. They are in high demand as companions on delves: they have an understanding of the Heart, a good sword arm and a suit of powered armour built from scavenged train materials that helps keep them (and their allies) alive.

Knights will inscribe the names of landmarks that they have discovered, or found stable routes to, on their armour - it is as much a research project and an advertisement of their prowess as it is a means of protection. Each knight's suit is utterly unique, using technology taken from a dozen different places: different gauges of steels, different weights and levels of protection and flexibility and controls that are often inscrutable to anyone but the creator themselves
vermissian_knight.name: Vermisiański Rycerz

core.vermissian_plate.name: Vermisiańska Płyta
core.vermissian_plate.description:
Twój pancerz składa się ze pozbieranej, ledwo zrozumiałej technologii pochodzącej z alternatywnych rzeczywistości tuneli Vermis. Raz na sesję, możesz zużyć zasób z domeny „Technologia” lub „Okultyzm”, by ulepszyć lub naprawić swoją zbroję. Rzuć kośćmi zasobu i wybierz jedną z poniższych opcji:
  • Usuń stres Krwi, Umysłu lub Echa równy wyrzuconemu wynikowi.
  • Zadaj stres wyprawie albo przeciwnikowi równy wyrzuconemu wynikowi.
  • (zasób D8 lub lepszy) Uzyskaj dostęp do dodatkowej umiejętności lub domeny na resztę sesji.
  • (zasób D8 lub lepszy) Zwiększ ochronę Krwi o 1 na resztę sytuacji.

minor.arcane_rebreather.name: Arcane Rebreather
minor.arcane_rebreather.description: You possess a gas mask that filters out airborne infectants from the Heart. +2 Echo Protection.
minor.armour_plating.name: Opancerzenie
minor.armour_plating.description: Charakterystyczna zbroja, wykonana z przerobionych wagonów kolejowych, nosi symbole linii kolejowych, które tworzyły Vermis. Otrzymujesz +2 ochrony Krwi.
minor.black_knight.name: Czarny Rycerz
minor.black_knight.description: Studiowałeś zakazane sztuki z mędrcami twojego zakonu. Zyskujesz domenę „Okultyzm”. Raz na sesję, gdy wchodzisz do miejsca, możesz wyczuć lokalizację okultystycznej sekty, która przechowuje informacje, które pomogą Ci w wykonywanym zadaniu.
minor.knight_protector.name: Knight Protector
minor.knight_protector.description: You are willing to kill and die to ensure that the Vermissian is safe. Gain the Kill skill. Once per situation, when an ally within arm's reach would mark stress to Blood, you mark an equivalent amount to Blood instead.
minor.hellwalker.name: Hellwalker
minor.hellwalker.description: You have been anointed with the sacred oils that protect you from the nightmare energies of the Heart. Gain the Cursed domain. You can use a resource with the Cursed domain to activate your VERMISSIAN PLATE core ability.
minor.phantom_lens.name: Phantom Lens
minor.phantom_lens.description: Various blood, ichors and spittles have been used to treat these lenses, allowing you to see into dimensions other than the material. Gain the Hunt skill. While you wear these lenses, you can track anything - even if it doesn't leave a tangible trail.
minor.protector's_gauntlet.name: Protector's Gauntlet
minor.protector's_gauntlet.description: A heavy metal gauntlet bearing the emblem of your house: The Lords Galvanic, The Free Wheels, The Cross Countrymen. +1 Blood Protection, +1 Fortune protection.
minor.sanguinary_array.name: Sanguinary Array
minor.sanguinary_array.description: Your inefficient mortal heart is supplemented by a rig that extracts, filters and nourishes your vital fluids. One side effect of this is that your blood acts as an antenna for the scattershot electrical impulses of the Heart. Gain the Discern skill. If one of your senses becomes damaged or unusable, you can replace it with the weird echoes that shudder through your exposed blood - it's not perfect, but it'll do.
minor.stalwart.name: Dzielny
minor.stalwart.description: Zdobywasz +1 Ochrony we Krwi, Echo, Szczęściu lub Zapasach. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.steelbones.name: Stalowe Kości
minor.steelbones.description: Your armour bolts onto special implants that absorb harmful energy and distribute it through your body. Gain the Endure skill. You can fall distances of up to 3 storeys without taking damage.
minor.student_of_the_sages.name: Student Of The Sages
minor.student_of_the_sages.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących umiejętności: Manipulacja, Wyprawa, Obserwacja, Odporność, Polowanie, Zabijanie, Łączenie. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.tunnel_rat.name: Tunnel Rat
minor.tunnel_rat.description: You have performed the Rite of Suffocation, and know ways of slowing your breathing to survive longer. Gain the Warren domain. You can hold your breath for a very long time, allowing you to stay underwater or in toxic areas for extended periods.
minor.well_travelled.name: Well Travelled
minor.well_travelled.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących domen: Klątwa, Odludzie, Schronienie, Okultyzm, Technologia, Norowisko, Dzicz. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.helixican_burst.name: Spiralny Wybuch
minor.helixican_burst.description: Kiedy aktywujesz POLE ETERYCZNE, zadajesz obrażenia równe ochronie Echo wszystkim przeciwnikom stojącym w pobliżu.
minor.recharge.name: Doładowanie
minor.recharge.description: Po użyciu POLA ETERYCZNEGO możesz użyć go ponownie, zużywając zasób o wartości D6 lub wyższej ze domeny „Okultyzm” albo „Klątwa”.
minor.anathema.name: Klątwa
minor.anathema.description: Kiedy POLE ETERYCZNE jest aktywne, twoje ataki wręcz wymierzone w sercokrwiste stworzenia lub ludzi zyskują tag Brutalny.
minor.hunted.name: Hunted
minor.hunted.description: Name the creature that is coming after you. Once per session, you can declare that it replaces the opposition in a dangerous scene as it eats them, chases them off or causes a big distraction - the GM decides. You'll have to fight or evade it yourself now, of course. If you kill it, gain a minor advance and remove this ability.
minor.endurance_training.name: Endurance Training
minor.endurance_training.description: Your greatblade no longer has the Tiring tag, and inflicts D8 stress against human-sized targets.
minor.applied_research.name: Applied Research
minor.applied_research.description: Once per situation, when you inflict stress on an adversary, you can identify its weak spots. For the remainder of the situation, you treat that adversary's difficulty as one step lower (to a minimum of Standard) when acting against it.
minor.last_minute_intervention.name: Last-minute Intervention
minor.last_minute_intervention.description: Once per session, when an ally within arm's reach of you suffers Blood fallout, immediately downgrade it by one step (or remove it if it's Minor fallout).
minor.steam_vent.name: Steam Vent
minor.steam_vent.description: Your armour gains the Smoke tag, and you can activate it at will.
minor.back_to_back.name: Back-to-back
minor.back_to_back.description: If there's only one ally within arm's reach of you, they gain +2 Blood protection instead of +1.
minor.puncture.name: Przebicie
minor.puncture.description: When you activate OVERCLOCK, you may choose to add the Piercing tag to your attacks in addition to the Brutal tag. If you do this, mark D6 stress to Fortune after using the ability.
minor.momentum.name: Rozpęd
minor.momentum.description: When you activate OVERCLOCK, you may choose to add the Trusty tag to a Delve roll instead of the Brutal tag to an attack.
minor.galvanic_crucible.name: Galvanic Crucible
minor.galvanic_crucible.description: Możesz aktywować zdolność VERMISIAŃSKA PŁYTA dwa razy na sesję, a nie tylko raz. Za drugim razem musisz ponieść D4 stresu Szczęścia.
minor.first_to_the_front.name: First To The Front
minor.first_to_the_front.description: When you lead a party in a fight you may activate this ability. When active, increase the stress dice that you and the adversary inflict on each other by one step.
minor.pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
minor.pathfinder.description: When you attempt to establish a connection on a delve, roll with mastery.
minor.keep_your_heads_down.name: Keep Your Heads Down
minor.keep_your_heads_down.description: Whilst on a delve, any ally who can see or hear you while you give orders gains +1 Fortune protection.

major.aetheric_field.name: Pole Eteryczne
major.aetheric_field.description: Twój pancerz brzęczy od wyładowań elektrostatycznych, które sprawiają, że włosy stają dęba. Wyładowania może uchronić cię przed wypaczającymi efektami tuneli Vermis. Raz na sesję możesz zostać +3 ochrony Echa do końca sytuacji.
major.dragon_killer.name: Dragon-killer
major.dragon_killer.description: You have been entrusted with a greatblade from the order's vaults - an ancient weapon designed to slay the fiercest abominations within the Vermissian network. A greatblade has two profiles: one when used against human-sized targets (Kill D6, Tiring), and one when used against targets significantly larger than yourself (Kill D10, Tiring).
major.get_behind_me.name: Get Behind Me
major.get_behind_me.description: You know that you can't explore the world alone, so you've learned to keep your team alive. Any ally within arm's reach of you gains +1 Blood protection thanks to your interventions. Once per situation, you can bellow an order and remove D4 Blood or Mind stress from a nearby ally.
major.overclock.name: Overclock
major.overclock.description: You push your Vermissian Plate up to, and honestly beyond, its limits. You may activate this ability at any time. When you do, make an immediate melee attack; your weapon gains the Brutal tag. After using the ability, mark D4 stress to Fortune as you push your luck and strain your engines.
major.trailblazer.name: Trailblazer
major.trailblazer.description: Leading teams of explorers to lost sites and distant stations have taught you how best to move throughtheCity Beneath - even at a cost to your own health. When you lead a party on a delve, you may activate this ability. When active, increase the stress dice inflicted on the delve (and that the delve inflicts on you) by one step.

zenith.end_of_the_line.name: End Of The Line
zenith.end_of_the_line.description: A lifetime of searching has paid off: you discover what you've been looking for all these years. On tier 2 or deeper, you may activate this power. You learn of the location of a unique landmark - something truly extraordinary. Work out what it is with the GM. You must complete a delve to reach it. Once there, you cannot leave the landmark. Instead, you die in some tragic fashion, vow to protect it forever or ascend into a pure state of electricity and echoing rails. Your character is removed from the story.
zenith.perpetual_motion_engine.name: Perpetual Motion Engine
zenith.perpetual_motion_engine.description: Years of heartsblood radiation and forbidden knowledge culminate in your ultimate work: an engine powered by a throbbing heart seed, a source of wild and limitless power. Upon implantation of the heartseed into your suit's furnace, you become an unstoppable force within the City Beneath - indeed, you can never stop moving. You stamp off into the darkness, and your character is removed from the story except for the DEUS EX MACHINA ability that is granted to all surviving members of your party.
zenith.the_last_train.name: The Last Train
zenith.the_last_train.description: You consume your power in a forbidden rite. Etching ancient timetables onto the walls in the blood of angels, and lighting signal-fires in colours not visible to the naked eye, you summon The Last Train to you rposition. The Last Train arrives at your current position by the most direct and destructive route, destroying anything in its path. You are killed when this ability is used - crushed under the wheels of the train, riddled with strange energies and cooked in your armour or burned out from the occult strain.

witch.description:
Głęboko w Mieście Poniżej istnieje choroba, która przedostaje się do krwi i wiąże ofiarę z tym miejscem, włączając ją do czegoś większego niż ona sama. Ci, którzy nawiązali taką więź, nazywani są wiedźmami oraz czarownikami i są postrzegani przez innych mieszkańców Serca z mieszaniną podejrzliwości i podziwu.

Każda odmiana choroby ma swój rodowód i historię z nią związaną, a wiedźmy uważają, by nie zarazić tych, którzy ich zdaniem mogliby zmarnować ten dar. Ta długa tradycja, w połączeniu ze sposobem, w jaki niektóre czarownice mogą zabić przeciętną osobę, po prostu na nią spoglądając, powoduje, że grupa ta jest traktowana jak szlachta lub wysłannicy samego Serca. Są niemal jak fae, istniejąc w swoim własnym świecie dziwnych i ezoterycznych praktyk, przekazywanych ustnie przez kilka stuleci.

Główną siedzibą wiedźm jest Hallow, zdezelowane miasteczko zbudowane w spalonej katedrze wewnątrz Serca. Niemal każda czarownica przeszła przez to miejsce, zmierza tam lub unika go za wszelką cenę.
witch.name: Wiedźma

resource.tattered_finery: Podniszczona galanteria (jedwabny szal, przetarta biżuteria itp.)

core.crucible.name: Tygiel
core.crucible.description: Kumulujesz energię Serca w sobie i przekształcasz ją w szkarłatną moc. W dowolnym momencie możesz rzucić D6, jeśli wynik jest równy lub niższy od aktualnego stresu Echo, usuń tyle stresu z Echo i wykonaj następną akcję z mistrzostwem. Jeśli wynik jest wyższy, ponieś tyle stresu Echo.
core.true_form.name: Prawdziwa Natura
core.true_form.description: Twoja skóra drży z trudną do opanowania siłą. Twoja sercokrew gotuje się, tylko czekając, by przemienić cię w migoczącego, stroboskopowego potwora. Kiedy doznasz Poważnej Konsekwencji lub gdy sam tego chcesz, możesz przemienić się w swoją prawdziwą formę. Jej dokładny wygląd zależy od ciebie. Kiedy jesteś w swojej prawdziwej formie, rzucasz z mistrzostwem na testy Polowania i Zabijania, ale wszystkie inne testy stają się Ryzykowne. Po zakończeniu bieżącej sytuacji powracasz do swojej humanoidalnej postaci.

minor.a_mind_of_many_doorways.name: A Mind Of Many Doorways
minor.a_mind_of_many_doorways.description: Mortal concerns fade in comparison to the majesty of the blood-song that resonates within you. Gain +2 Mind Protection.
minor.blood_quiet.name: Krwawa Cisza
minor.blood_quiet.description: The darkness of the City Beneath beats black within your veins. Gain the Sneak skill. When you enter your TRUE FORM, Sneak and Evade rolls are no longer considered Risky.
minor.books_of_lore.name: Books Of Lore
minor.books_of_lore.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących domen: Klątwa, Odludzie, Okultyzm, Religia, Norowisko, Dzicz. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.charms_and_wards.name: Charms And Wards
minor.charms_and_wards.description: Zdobywasz +1 Ochrony we Krwi, Umyśle, Szczęściu lub Zapasach. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.distinguished_lineage.name: Wybitny Ród
minor.distinguished_lineage.description: Your blood-mothers have operated in the City Beneath for centuries; you carry the weight of their actions (and their promises) on your back. Gain the Haven domain. Once per session, when you mark stress to a bond, do not roll for fallout.
minor.divinity.name: Boskość
minor.divinity.description: You were inducted into a coven who believe that witches are blessed by the gods; you recognise a second heartbeat, unknowable and sacred, inside you. Gain the Religion domain. Roll Discern+Religion to follow the secret  signs in an inhabited landmark that lead to the hidden places of worship where you are revered as a messenger of the Heart Itself.
minor.heart_wise.name: Heart-Wise
minor.heart_wise.description: Zyskujesz dostęp do jednej z następujących umiejętności: Manipulacja, Wyprawa, Obserwacja, Odporność, Polowanie, Zabijanie, Łączenie. Możesz wybrać tę zdolność więcej niż raz.
minor.implacable.name: Nieustępliwy
minor.implacable.description: You have withstood worse torments, and you will go onto do so again; through your blood you are stable, eternal, unwavering. Gain the Endure skill. Once per session, add 1 to a resistance of your choice. Remove the +1 at the end of the session.
minor.the_old_blood.name: The Old Blood
minor.the_old_blood.description: You inherited the disease from an ancient bloodline; you are strange, and powerful, and can see echoes of things that others can't. Gain the Discern skill. When you observe someone for a few seconds, you can read their aura and discern their surface-level emotions - whether they're angry, happy, frustrated and soon.
minor.ramblewyrd.name: Ramblewyrd
minor.ramblewyrd.description: You are well-versed in exploring and surviving the places most connected to the Heart Itself; sometimes you do it for pleasure. Gain the Cursed domain. Once per session, when you are in an area with the Cursed domain, remove D6 stress from resistances of your choice.
minor.red_dominion.name: Red Dominion
minor.red_dominion.description: You don't bleed unless you want to; when you're angry, your veins pulse visibly beneath your skin. Gain +2 Blood protection.
minor.wild_witch.name: Wild-Witch
minor.wild_witch.description: You know the secrets of the wild things of the world, and are skilled at distilling their essences. Gain the Wild domain. When you're in a landmark and have time to prepare, you can turn a resource with the Wild domain into a healing draught. When drunk, this draught removes Blood or Mind stress equal to its dice size minus one step - choose whether it's Blood or Mind when you create it.
minor.witch_spit.name: Wiedźmia Ślina
minor.witch_spit.description: Mówią, że ślina Wiedźmy może wyleczyć drobne dolegliwości, naprawić drobiazgi lub ukoić zbolałe serce. Twoja zasklepia rany wylotowe. Zdobywasz umiejętność „Składanie”. Możesz sprawić, że ślina stanie się kleista lub stwardnieje w smolistą substancję.
minor.bypass.name: Bypass
minor.bypass.description: The first time you cast this spell on a delve, it functions as a D6 Boon.
minor.blood_calls_for_blood.name: Blood Calls For Blood
minor.blood_calls_for_blood.description: All weapons used in the area increase their stress dice by 1 step for both adversaries and player characters.
minor.refuge.name: Refuge
minor.refuge.description: Clear D6 Fortune stress on you or an ally each time you cast this spell.
minor.shared_visions.name: Shared Visions
minor.shared_visions.description: Your allies can also roll with mastery when they interact with the portentous items.
minor.scarlet_insight.name: Scarlet Insight
minor.scarlet_insight.description: Once per session, when you cast this spell, clear D8 stress from Mind or Fortune.
minor.dire_portents.name: Dire Portents
minor.dire_portents.description: Once per session, re-roll any dice that you or anyone else rolled; the original roll is a vision you received, and you shout a warning (or act differently this time around).
minor.retch.name: Retch
minor.retch.description: The stress dice increases to D8.
minor.maestro.name: Maestro
minor.maestro.description: The weapon gains the Piercing tag.
minor.as_above_so_below.name: As Above, So Below
minor.as_above_so_below.description: You do not need line of sight to use EXSANGUINATE as long as you have a sympathetic token connected to your target (their hair, a figurine in their shape, a favoured item of theirs, etc. ), but you are still limited to making an attack within the usual distance of the Range tag.
minor.resilient.name: Resilient
minor.resilient.description: You can mark 6 total stress, instead of 4, before you lose access to your familiar for the remainder of the session.
minor.hungry.name: Głód
minor.hungry.description: Your familiar functions as a (D8 Kill, Ranged, Unreliable) item.
minor.curious.name: Curious
minor.curious.description: Your familiar functions as a (D8 Delve, Unreliable) item.
minor.enthrall.name: Zniewolenie
minor.enthrall.description: Kiedy przemieniasz się w swoją prawdziwą formę, możesz ponieść D4 stresu Echo, by wszyscy widzący przemianę zostali ogłuszeni. Będą w tym stanie przez wystarczająco dużo czasu, byś mógł wykonać pojedynczą akcję całkowicie bez sprzeciwu.
minor.sacred_object.name: Święty Obiekt
minor.sacred_object.description: Raz na sesję, gdy przybierasz swoją prawdziwą postać, zmniejsz o jeden stopień jedną konsekwencję Krwi, na którą cierpisz.
minor.union.name: Zjednoczenie
minor.union.description: Raz na sytuację, gdy jesteś w swojej prawdziwej formie i akcja, którą wykonujesz, byłaby uznana za Ryzykowną, potraktuj ją jako Standardową.
minor.calm.name: Calm
minor.calm.description: Your lair no longer inflicts stress on non-witches when they enter, unless you wish it to. You can't pick specific targets - it's either active or inactive.
minor.rule.name: Władza
minor.rule.description: While in your lair, you roll with mastery on all actions.
minor.feed.name: Pasza
minor.feed.description: Once per session, you may feed a helpless or dead person or animal to your lair to remove stress from your bond. The larger the creature, the more stress you remove from the bond - a cat is D4, a person is D6, and if you can haul or lure a bear in there it's D12.

major.ascendancy.name: Ascendencja
major.ascendancy.description: You know the secret of singing the City Beneath into different shapes. Roll Compel+Occult to cast this spell and draw the Heart Itself into the area around you. The area you're in gains the Occult domain, and reacts appropriately: magic circles blossom on the floor and thrum with dark power, mist floods the air and so on. This lasts until the end of your current situation.
major.crimson_mirror.name: Crimson Mirror
major.crimson_mirror.description: You bleed onto an upturned mirror, and omens swim within the crimson. Roll Discern+Occult to cast this spell before you embark on a delve. On a success, you see three omens; describe them. You don't have to be too specific - in fact, the more vague you are, the better. These are fated to come up on the delve. The first time you interact with whatever you find that relates to each omen, you roll with mastery.
major.exsanguinate.name: Wykrwawienie
major.exsanguinate.description: You pluck a target's blood out of its mouth and nose, choking it on its own viscera. This spell functions as a weapon with the following tags: (Kill D6, ranged). You can mark stress accrued as a result of using this spell to Echo.
major.familiar.name: Familiar
major.familiar.description: You have developed a special relationship with a creature; you feed it your blood, and in return it accepts the monstrous changes of your magic. You are accompanied by a small creature - no bigger than a dog - that is cowardly and strange to look at. Describe it. When you take stress from magical sources (including your own), you may assign that stress to your familiar instead of your own resistances. When you mark 4 total stress to your familiar, it is unavailable until the start of the next session. It returns changed; describe what aspect of it has been transformed by the magical energy coursing through it. At the start of each session, remove all stress marked against your familiar.
major.great_and_terrible.name: Wielki i Straszny
major.great_and_terrible.description: Odblokowujesz pełną potęgę swojej prawdziwej formy, budzącej podziw połączenia magii i ciała. Nie musisz przyjmować swojej prawdziwej formy, gdy ponosisz Poważną Konsekwencję. Gdy przemieniasz się w swoją prawdziwą formę, wszyscy przeciwnicy, którzy cię widzą, otrzymują D4 stresu.
major.lair.name: Lair
major.lair.description: You adopt or create a predatory building and claim it as your own; it still eats people, but it doesn't eat you. The building in question is no larger than a small shop or study. Inside, the shadows crawl and scurry, the walls creak and whisper and a maddening heartbeat thuds at the back of your consciousness - perfect for you, but unsettling for anyone else. Any non-witch who enters your lair must roll Resist+Occult and mark D6 stress to Echo on a failure or D4 stress to Echo on a partial success. When you are in a landmark, roll Mend+Occult to summon your lair. On a success, it's always been here, as far as anyone knows. Your lair acts as a bond (p. 98) - if it suffers fallout, it's either eaten someone who'll be missed or been damaged by suspicious locals.

zenith.final_form.name: Final Form
zenith.final_form.description: You reach down deep within yourself, inside the singing of your blood, and unearth your purest state: a nightblack being of wrath and ruin. Your true form was but a mere shadow of this. You have complete control over the landmark you are currently occupying (or the nearby area, if you're on a delve) and you are omniscient and omnipresent within its borders. You alone chooses who lives and dies inside. At the end of the situation after you activate this power, the area you are in is stained forever with your essence. It counts as one tier deeper than it was before and changes to become appropriately strange. You live on as an echo, a mark on the place; it becomes part of you, and you part of it.
zenith.perfect_resurrection.name: Perfect Resurrection
zenith.perfect_resurrection.description: The communion between flesh and fracture, between the mortal and the undying, becomes near-perfect. You can make a perfect copy of someone who has died, but only once. The copy is absolutely the same as the original, right down to the soul. The copy is so good, in fact, that the person can no longer permanently die. If they sustain damage that would kill them, they appear dead, but in fact a new copy is pupating somewhere in the depths of the Heart. It will slide out wetly within a lunar month. They get no say in this, and there is no known way to turn it off short of destroying the Heart Itself. Casting this spell takes an hour or so of ritual chanting and kills you.
zenith.the_red_queen.name: The Red Queen
zenith.the_red_queen.description: You ascend to dominance over the witches of Hallow. Following a long period of scheming or a single night of decisive action, you are now in charge of all the witches of Hallow. Such a force, when mobilised, is terrifying to behold: their true forms skitter and swarm across rooftops and in the shadows. Few can stand in their path and survive. After a session or two, the realities of being the head witch set in - there is a surprising amount of admin to do, and other witches are always coming to you with requests for aid. Pretty soon you're going to be interred in the Red Vaults beneath Hallow (as all the leaders of the witches are) to join the chorus of elders.

blood.battered.name: Poobijany
blood.battered.description: Zraniłeś swoją dominująca ręka. Możesz ją zabandażować i zatamować krwawienie, ale na razie musisz ją oszczędzać. Nie możesz wykonywać nią żadnych ruchów wymagających dużej zręczności, a działania podejmowane w walce stają się Ryzykowne. [Trwające]
blood.bleeding.name: Krwawienie
blood.bleeding.description: Pod koniec każdej sytuacji, podczas której masz tę konsekwencję, otrzymujesz D4 stresu Krwi. [Trwające]
blood.disarmed.name: Rozbrojony
blood.disarmed.description: Upuszczasz i tracisz wszystko, co trzymałeś, pozostając bezbronnym. Dopóki nie zdobędziesz broni, zadajesz wrogom D4 stresu. Jeśli znajdujesz się w niebezpiecznym miejscu, możesz stracić upuszczony przedmiot na zawsze. [Natychmiastowa]
blood.furious.name: Wściekły
blood.furious.description: Jesteś ranny, nerwowy i nieufny. Nie możesz pomagać innym bohaterom, dodając kość do ich rzutów. [Trwający]
blood.limping.name: Utykanie
blood.limping.description: You're slowed. If someone or something attacks your party, they'll attack you first. If there's any question over who arrives last, it's you. All checks involving rapid or stealthy movement become Risky. [Ongoing]
blood.ringing_head.name: Ringing Head
blood.ringing_head.description: Your head swims and you taste blood in your mouth. The next action you take is Dangerous, the one after that is Risky, and then you remove this fallout as your head clears. [Immediate]
blood.shattered.name: Rozbity
blood.shattered.description: [also: Supplies] Your armour is no longer of use. You cannot use Blood Protection. [Ongoing]
blood.spitting_teeth.name: Wybite zęby
blood.spitting_teeth.description: Każda czynność wymagająca mówienia lub wyglądania przyzwoicie, staje się Ryzykowna. [Trwająca]
blood.tired.name: Zmęczony
blood.tired.description: Jesteś zmęczony, podejmujesz złe decyzje i złościsz się na przyjaciół. Nie możesz dodawać kości z umiejętności do rzutów. [Trwająca]
blood.winded.name: Winded
blood.winded.description: Kiedy atakujesz wręcz, zmniejsz zadawaną kostkę stresu o jeden poziom. [Trwający]

mind.clouded.name: Zamglone myśli
mind.clouded.description: Twój umysł wyłącza się, próbując się ochronić. Nie myślisz jasno, a twoje odczucia są przytępione. Nie możesz zyskać dodatkowych kości z domen. [Trwająca]
mind.creepy.name: Dziwny
mind.creepy.description: Reagujesz w dziwny sposób, który straszy twoich sojuszników. Opowiedz, jak to robisz. Każdy, kto to zobaczy, otrzymuje D4 stresu Umysłu. [Natychmiastowa]
mind.collateral_magic.name: Collateral Magic
mind.collateral_magic.description: Your panicked mind breaks for a second and reforms in an arcane pattern; down here, the old magics of blood and bone work better than they do on the surface. You immediately cast AETHERIC SCOURGE on a nearby ally, but mark no stress for doing so. This fallout can be upgraded (see AETHERIC RESONANCE below).[Immediate]
mind.fascination.name: Fascynacja
mind.fascination.description: You become obsessed with a strange topic usually whatever caused the fallout. You must try and learn more about it, first hand if possible. Whenever you attempt to learn more about your weird fascination, roll with mastery. If you have the opportunity to learn about it and you refuse, mark D4 stress to Mind. [Ongoing]
mind.figment.name: Wymysł
mind.figment.description: You lose track of what's real and what's not. The GM picks a Minor fallout from a different resistance and tells you have it.Until this fallout is removed, you're convinced you're suffering from the fallout (no matter what others tell you) and suffer from all appropriate effects. (GM: it is up to you whether you inform the player that this is a delusion or not.) [Ongoing]
mind.shaken.name: Wstrząśnięty
mind.shaken.description: You panic and fall back on your primitive impulses. The GM chooses one: Fight (attack the problem in an attempt to destroy it), Flight (get away from the problem by any means necessary) or Freeze (do not act, putting yourself in danger). At the end of the situation, remove this fallout. [Immediate]
mind.take_the_edge_off.name: Take The Edge Off
mind.take_the_edge_off.description: You can't get your head right until you have a drink (or something stronger). Until you reach a landmark with access to intoxicants and render yourself insensible, roll two dice when you mark stress to Mind and pick the higher. Can be upgraded to ADDICT. [Ongoing]
mind.vulnerable.name: Vulnerable
mind.vulnerable.description: You feel small, shaken and scared. You cannot use Mind protection. [Ongoing]
mind.weird.name: Weird
mind.weird.description: You do something unsettling that bothers normal people - obsessive behaviour, singing to yourself,fulfilling a strange compulsion at inappropriate times. At the earliest opportunity, the GM can declare that your weirdness puts a useful NPC off you (and probably your allies, too).[Immediate,Ongoing]

echo.buboes.name: Buboes
echo.buboes.description: Your skin blisters and bubbles. When you take Blood stress, take an extra D4 as the boils split and burst. [Ongoing]
echo.conduit.name: Conduit
echo.conduit.description: Your best efforts to keep the unreal energies of the Heart at bay are futile: your body is a crucible for strangeness. You cannot use Echo protection. [Ongoing]
echo.dejavu.name: Dejavu
echo.dejavu.description: You notice minor elements of your past life appearing in the Heart as though it is reading your mind and adapting itself to your expectations; the GM tells you what happens. [Immediate, Ongoing]
echo.aetheric_scourge.name: Aetheric Scourge
echo.aetheric_scourge.description: Mark D6 stress to cast this spell. A nearby target takes D6 stress as raw magic boils out of you and into them, burning their skin and hair.
echo.exodus.name: Exodus
echo.exodus.description: You retch up a handful of writhing creatures: pallid fat moths, translucent grubs, spiders with the wrong number of legs, throbbing parasites and so on.Anyone who sees this and isn't ready for it marks D4 stress to Mind. [Immediate]
echo.follower.name: Follower
echo.follower.description: Someone, or something, believes you are very important: chosen of the Heart and worth following. A weird-looking but essentially harmless creature or person follows you at a distance; they won't approach you, but they'll be keen to sift through your rubbish or attempt to hurt anyone who looks like they might want to get in your way. [Ongoing]
echo.glitch.name: Błąd
echo.glitch.description: You disappear, only reappearing after every other player has acted at least once. [Immediate]
echo.hex-eye.name: Hex-Eye
echo.hex-eye.description: Your vision swims as you start to perceive worlds other than your own layered on top of one another.Any action you take that requires accurate judging of distance (jumping, shooting,running down a corridor) becomes Risky. Once per session, you see something useful - ask the GM what it is.[Ongoing]
echo.the_ravening_call.name: The Ravening Call
echo.the_ravening_call.description: This fallout has no effect, but it stays on your character, and occasionally manifests as a broken, staccato howl in the back of their mind. Should this fallout by upgraded, see THE RAVENING BEAST below. [Ongoing]
echo.strange_appetite.name: Strange Appetite
echo.strange_appetite.description: You crave unusual - taboo - things rather than good honest meat and drink: rusted metal, living creatures, vermin, effluvia, used clothing, beloved pets, etc. Next time you visit a haunt and attempt to refresh Blood or Mind stress, you must seek out this weirdness and indulge in it; otherwise you will be unable to refresh. Once you've sought out the weirdness, remove this fallout. This fallout can be upgraded into DARK CRAVINGS.[Ongoing]
echo.siren_song.name: Siren Song
echo.siren_song.description: You cannot shake the thought of a particular place or person from your mind (the GM will pick a nearby landmark or NPC). If you do anything other than move towards it or remove obstacles in your path, the action becomes Risky. Once you reach it, the feeling dissipates. [Ongoing]

fortune.broken.name: Broken
fortune.broken.description: An important item is damaged. You cannot use it until you take the time and resources to repair it. [Ongoing]
fortune.collateral.name: Collateral
fortune.collateral.description: The next time you mark stress, a nearby ally marks the same amount; you then remove this fallout. [Immediate]
fortune.foreboding.name: Foreboding
fortune.foreboding.description: Something bad is about to happen. GM, hint at an ominous future event - smoke in the distance, the tremors before a pulse, the frantic music of the Carnival. This fallout can be upgraded to CRISIS (see below). [Ongoing]
fortune.the_hard_way.name: The Hard Way
fortune.the_hard_way.description: You lead the party into danger. The next obstacle the group attempts to overcome is Dangerous; they can reduce it to Risky, or even Standard, with a decent plan. [Immediate]
fortune.in_trouble.name: In Trouble
fortune.in_trouble.description: You upset an important figure in this or a nearby haven. [Immediate, Ongoing]
fortune.long_way_round.name: Long Way Round
fortune.long_way_round.description: You take longer than expected to reach your target. On a delve, add D6 to the delve's resistance. If you're searching for someone or something in a landmark, you arrive just late enough to be in trouble. [Immediate]
fortune.separated.name: Separated
fortune.separated.description: You think you hear something, but when you turn to tell your allies, they are gone. You'll have to track them down or hope they find you. [Immediate]
fortune.unlucky.name: Unlucky
fortune.unlucky.description: Things are going to get worse before they get better. You cannot use Fortune protection. [Ongoing]
fortune.word_of_mouth.name: Word Of Mouth
fortune.word_of_mouth.description: Word spreads of your misdeeds. Wherever you're headed next, someone knows you're going there,and is going to try to take advantage of you. The GM shows how word is spreading. [Immediate]

supplies.broken.name: Broken
supplies.broken.description: An important item is damaged. You cannot use it until you take the time and resources to repair it. [Ongoing]
supplies.damaged.name: Uszkodzenie
supplies.damaged.description: A resource you're carrying is defective in some way – dented, torn, scuffed or cracked. Reduce its dice size by 1 step. [Immediate]
supplies.darkness.name: Darkness
supplies.darkness.description: Twoje zapasy iglicadzkiego oleju są na wyczerpaniu. Wszystkie wykonywane przez ciebie testy Wyprawy lub Obserwacji stają się Ryzykowne. Inny członek drużyny może usunąć tę konsekwencję, otrzymując D6 stresu Zapasów. [Trwająca]
supplies.debtor.name: Dłużnik
supplies.debtor.description: Podczas tej lub następnej sesji, bohater niezależny, który pożyczył Ci pieniądze, wezwie cię, byś je spłacił. [Natychmiastowa]
supplies.empty.name: Pusty kieszenie
supplies.empty.description: Zostały ci ostatnie resztki jedzenia, ostatnie szczypty iglicadzy. Nie możesz korzystać z ochrony Zapasów. [Trwająca]
supplies.half_rations.name: Half Rations
supplies.half_rations.description: You're running low on food.When you remove stress, roll two dice and pick the lowest of the two. Another party member can remove this fallout by marking D6 stress to Supplies.[Ongoing]
supplies.out_of_ammo.name: Brak amunicji
supplies.out_of_ammo.description: Skończyła Ci się amunicja do broni dystansowej lub w jakiś sposób zasilanej i nie możesz jej już używać. Jeśli inny członek drużyny ma podobną broń może usunąć tę konsekwencję, otrzymując D6 stresu Zapasów. [Trwająca]
supplies.used_up.name: Used Up
supplies.used_up.description: Your stocks are depleted of crucial items, something has spoiled or someone's stolen something vital from your bag. You cannot use any healing items you own.[Ongoing]

blood.arterial_wound.name: Arterial Wound
blood.arterial_wound.description: As BLEEDING, but you mark D6 stress at the end of every situation. [Ongoing]
blood.blinded.name: Oślepiony
blood.blinded.description: Nic nie widzisz albo widzisz tak słabo, że równie dobrze mógłbyś być ślepy. Może to być permanentne. Każde zadanie wymagające widzenia (a więc większość) staje się Akcją Niebezpieczną. [Trwająca]
blood.broken_arm.name: Broken Arm
blood.broken_arm.description: Twoja ręka łamię się pod wpływem wysiłku, a odłamki kości przebijają się przez skórę. Nie możesz używać ręki, dopóki się nie zagoi, co sprawi, że niektóre akcje będą Ryzykowne lub Niebezpieczne, a inne Niemożliwe. Ta konsekwencja może zostać obniżona lub podwyższona z BATTERED. [Trwająca]
blood.broken_leg.name: Broken Leg
blood.broken_leg.description: Your leg bones splinter and crack. Any action involving the leg (climbing, moving above a crawl) automatically fails. This fallout can be downgraded to or upgraded from LIMPING. [Ongoing]
blood.critical_injury.name: Critical Injury
blood.critical_injury.description: You take a hit somewhere vital. The GM picks a skill you have access to and you no longer have access to that skill. For example, a hit to your sword-arm could remove Kill; an eye injury could remove Discern; ripped tendons in your fingers could remove Mend. [Ongoing]
blood.downed.name: Downed
blood.downed.description: You can't move under your own power and you're barely clinging on to consciousness. You can be moved around by others,but without medical attention, you're not going anywhere. Can be upgraded to DYING.[Ongoing]
blood.exhausted.name: Wyczerpany
blood.exhausted.description: You can't go on; if you push yourself any harder you're going to pass out. Stop now,or convince someone else to carry you the rest of the way. Alternatively, make one more action and then fall unconscious once the roll is resolved. [Immediate, Ongoing]

mind.aetheric_resonance.name: Aetheric Resonance
mind.aetheric_resonance.description: As COLLATERAL MAGIC Minor fallout, but you permanently learn AETHERIC SCOURGE and can cast it at will. [Ongoing]
mind.addict.name: Addict
mind.addict.description: You realise that you have become reliant on drugs to keep yourself stable.
